text:
The issues seems to surface when a JSP contains only a directive. Stacktrace below ---------------------------------------- /pre>

text:
The problem comes when there is no debug line info for the JSP.  The generation
of the SMAP is suppressed in this case.
creator: kin-man.chung@sun.com
